activity.title: ohcnetwork/features#10
activity.text:
For your online consultation and telemedicine, you must have features like in-app chat, voice, and video chats, and maybe live streaming for occasional information sessions. 

Building all these functionalities, starting from scratch, requires an excellent chat infrastructure, resources, and time. I'd suggest using Chat APIs and SDKs to hit a quick launch by accompanying all the necessary ones. 

Here is a detailed guide to choosing the best video calling APIs in the industry for your online consultation/telemedicine. [https://www.trustfirms.com/live-video-calling-apis-sdks-for-web-mobile-apps](https://www.trustfirms.com/live-video-calling-apis-sdks-for-web-mobile-apps)
